about_the_game:
In a quest to break the curse, a lone traveller must reach the heart of the Forbidden Capital to unleash the power of the Ancient Source.

CURSED CHARACTER

  • You must select a curse for your new character at creation.
  • The selected curse is heavily influnces your playthrough, so choose wisely.




CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAYSTYLE

  • Define your playstyle with your class, as every class has its own unique trait and attribute distribution.
  • Customize your active abilities, weapons, and gear.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED CITY

  • Every playthrough is different.
  • Explore a vast procedurally generated city full of enemies, loot and hidden passages.

SURVIVAL MECHANICS

  • Scavenge for resources.
  • Deal with sanity, hunger and thirst while trying to survive.

DEADLY NIGHT

  • Find a monolith before nightfall as the night is dark and full of terrors.
  • Monoliths will keep you safe, surviving the night is hopeless without them.

SETTLEMENTS

  • Settlements built around mysterious monoliths are the last safe places in the capital.
  • Interact with NPCs like traders, blacksmiths and weapon masters.
  • Learn new abilities, buy new equipment or upgrade your existing gear.

ABOUT THE DEVELOPER

I am NECROW a solo developer, the only creator of NECROBLADE.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please join the Official Discord server or follow me @devNecrow on Twitter.

Also if you want to support the project, please WISHLIST and FOLLOW the game on Steam.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content

short_description: NECROBLADE is a grimdark fantasy adventure with survival and RPG elements. On your way to the heart of the capital, you must explore, scavenge, battle hordes of enemies and upgrade abilities to survive. Which will kill you? The terrible curse or the deadly quest to break it?
